definitions: a widely distributed fungus which has a tall whitish stem with a rounded greenish-brown gelatinous head that turns into a foul-smelling slime containing the spores.

notes.text: Family Phallaceae, class Gasteromycetes: many species, including the common European Phallus impudicus

shortDefinitions: widely distributed fungus which has tall whitish stem with rounded greenish-brown gelatinous head that turns into foul-smelling slime containing spores
